name: Galaxy Shooter ⚛☆🌟
description:
Your destiny depends on your starship driving skills...

CONTROLS:

Use WASD or ARROW keys to move

Use SPACE or Left Mouse Button to Shoot

Use ENTER to start the game

Press ESCAPE to exit

Created thanks to this great Udemy course by Jonathan and Carlos:

https://www.udemy.com/la-guia-definitiva-del-desarrollo-de-videojuegos-con-unity...

Author: Yone Moreno Jimenez
